welcome.title: Welcome to Numeraire SwissKnife
welcome.content: See that orange dot? That's Bitcoin absorbing the monetary value of every other asset in the universe. Be part of the journey with a mighty Bitcoin Lightning wallet.

custody.title: Be Self-Sovereign
custody.content: Hold your own keys in self-custody so no-one but you can access your funds.

accessibility.title: Up & Running
accessibility.content: Connect to your own node or get one for free running in the cloud. With support for all major Lightning node implementations.

multi_user.title: Multiple Users
multi_user.content: Create as many wallets as you need with instantaneous and free internal transfers between users.
